properties.entry: SELECT M1.MEM_NO "MEM_NO", M1.MEM_ID "LOGIN_ID", M2.MEM_ID "FOLLOWERS" FROM TB_FOLLOW F JOIN TB_MEMBER M1 ON (FOLLOWER_ID = M1.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M2 ON (FOLLOWING_ID = M2.MEM_NO) WHERE M1.MEM_NO = ? AND F.ACT_YN = 'Y'

SELECT M1.MEM_NO "MEM_NO", M1.MEM_ID "LOGIN_ID", M2.MEM_ID "FOLLOWING" FROM TB_FOLLOW F JOIN TB_MEMBER M1 ON (FOLLOWING_ID = M1.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M2 ON (FOLLOWER_ID = M2.MEM_NO) WHERE M1.MEM_NO = ? AND F.ACT_YN = 'Y'

UPDATE ( SELECT M1.MEM_NO, M2.MEM_ID, F.ACT_YN FROM TB_MEMBER M1, TB_MEMBER M2, TB_FOLLOW F WHERE M1.MEM_NO = F.FOLLOWING_ID AND M2.MEM_NO = F.FOLLOWER_ID AND M1.MEM_NO = ? AND M2.MEM_ID = ? ) SET ACT_YN ='N'

UPDATE ( SELECT M1.MEM_NO, M2.MEM_ID, F.ACT_YN FROM TB_MEMBER M1, TB_MEMBER M2, TB_FOLLOW F WHERE M1.MEM_NO = F.FOLLOWING_ID AND M2.MEM_NO= F.FOLLOWER_ID AND M2.MEM_NO = ? AND M1.MEM_ID = ? ) SET ACT_YN ='N'

UPDATE ( SELECT M1.MEM_NO, M2.MEM_ID, F.ACT_YN FROM TB_MEMBER M1, TB_MEMBER M2, TB_FOLLOW F WHERE M1.MEM_NO = F.FOLLOWING_ID AND M2.MEM_NO= F.FOLLOWER_ID AND M1.MEM_NO = ? AND M2.MEM_ID = ? ) SET ACT_YN ='Y'
